scripts.start:prod: browser-sync start --index dist/index.html --browser wslview --server --files= dist/*.html dist/*.js
scripts.build:dev: mkdir dist && npm run build-html && npm run build-stylesheet && ./node_modules/.bin/rollup --config --environment NODE_ENV:development
scripts.build:prod: mkdir dist && npm run build-html && npm run build-stylesheet && ./node_modules/.bin/rollup --config --environment NODE_ENV:production
